title: Pizza Stuffed Chicken Breasts
directions: Preheat oven to 375Â°F. Prepare a baking sheet with foil or parchment paper, and lay chicken out on prepared baking sheet.
To make the stuffing, mix together shredded raw mozzarella, tomato sauce, minced garlic, and seasonings in a small bowl.

Spread mixture out evenly over chicken breasts. Roll up each chicken breast, and place seam side down on baking sheet. Pour remaining tomato sauce over the top of the chicken breasts, and place 3 turkey pepperonis on top of each chicken breast.
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through (when chicken is no longer pink in the middle).
ingredients: 1/4 tsp. sea salt, unrefined, & fresh ground pepper, organic
1 tsp. Italian herbs or seasoning, organic
1/2 c. cheese, mozzarella, whole fat, raw, grass-fed or pastured, organic
